quoteText: You must be at least 13 years old to use our Services. The minimum age to use our Services without parental approval may be higher in your home country.
title: You must be at least 13 years old to use the service

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age
tosdr.tldr: The terms of service state: "You must be at least 13 years old to use our Services. The minimum age to use our Services without parental approval may be higher in your home country."
